book.title: If Tomorrow Comes
book.description:
Storyline: 
 This is a story of intrigue and revenge. Tracy Whitney is youg, beautiful and intelligent - and about to marry into wealth and glamour. Until, suddenly, she is betrayed, framed by a ruthless Mafia gang, abandoned by the man she loves. Only her ingenuity saves her and helps her fight back.
book.author: Sidney Sheldon
